name: YD WordPress Plugins Framework
author: Yann Dubois

sections.description:
Create new plugins quickly

This simple plugin development framework makes it super easy to create sophisticated custom plugins and widgets for WordPress 2.9+.

Please be aware that this is just an empty framework: when installed “as-is”, the plugin will not do anything.

It is just a base toolkit on which to build up actual features.

Compatible with PHP5.

This framework is used by all recent and upcoming [YD plugins](https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/profile/ydubois WordPress Plugins by Yann Dubois). File versions should be consistent between all installed YD plugins.

Active support

Drop me a line on my YD Recent Images plugin support site to report bugs, ask for specific feature or improvement, or just tell me how you’re using the framework.
It’s still in an active development stage, with new features coming out on a regular basis.

Revisions

  • 0.1.0. Initial beta release of 2010/11/16

Did you like it?

Drop me a line on http://www.yann.com/en/wp-plugins/yd-wordpress-plugins-framework

And… please rate this plugin –>
sections.installation:
WordPress automatic installation is fully supported and recommended.
Please be aware that the plugin does not have any actual feature implemented upon installation.
sections.faq:
Where should I ask questions?

http://www.yann.com/en/wp-plugins/yd-wordpress-plugins-framework

Use comments.

I will answer only on that page so that all users can benefit from the answer.
So please come back to see the answer or subscribe to that page’s post comments.

Puis-je poser des questions et avoir des docs en français ?

Oui, l’auteur est français.
(“but alors… you are French?”)

What is your e-mail address?

It is mentioned in the comments at the top of the main plugin file. However, please prefer comments on the plugin page (as indicated above) for all non-private matters.
